Masks are to be “required at all times” and “without exception” in the U.S. House of Representatives, Speaker Nancy Pelosi announced on Tuesday. The announcement strengthened an existing mask requirement, which did not apply to people who were speaking.

text: Attorney General William Barr’s resignation makes Jeffrey Rosen, his low-profile deputy, the nation’s top law enforcement official for President Trump’s last month. https://t.co/1U57t1PzDy

text:
If the U.S. wants to cut its greenhouse gas emissions to zero by 2050 — a goal endorsed by President-elect Joe Biden — the country will need to build a staggering amount of new energy infrastructure in the next 10 years.

name: nytimes
text:
A two-word phrase that has charmed children for generations — "snow day" — could soon disappear from New York City students' vocabulary as a result of the pandemic-driven shift to online learning.
